resume_text:
Sarah Johnson
Data Scientist

EXPERIENCE
Senior Data Scientist | FinTech Solutions | 2020-Present
- Built machine learning models for fraud detection achieving 95% accuracy and reducing false positives by 50%
- Developed customer churn prediction models saving $2M annually in retention costs
- Led data science team of 6 in deploying ML models to production using MLflow and Docker
- Created interactive dashboards in Tableau for executive decision-making
- Implemented A/B testing framework increasing conversion rates by 25%

Data Scientist | Analytics Corp | 2017-2020
- Designed NLP models for sentiment analysis processing 1M+ customer reviews
- Optimized recommendation engine increasing user engagement by 40%
- Collaborated with engineering team to build real-time data pipelines using Apache Spark
- Presented findings to C-level executives and stakeholders monthly

SKILLS
Languages: Python, R, SQL, Scala
ML/AI: scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, XGBoost, NLP, Deep Learning
Tools: Jupyter, MLflow, Docker, AWS SageMaker, Apache Spark, Git
Visualization: Tableau, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly
Statistics: A/B Testing, Hypothesis Testing, Regression, Time Series

EDUCATION
M.S. Data Science | Tech University | 2017
B.S. Statistics | State University | 2015

PUBLICATIONS
- "Deep Learning Approaches to Fraud Detection" - IEEE Conference 2022
- "Customer Churn Prediction in FinTech" - Journal of Applied ML 2021
job_description: Looking for an experienced Data Scientist to develop predictive models and machine learning solutions. Must have expertise in Python, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and statistical analysis. Experience with A/B testing, NLP, and deploying ML models to production required. Financial services experience preferred.
